name: The Seeker (itch)
description:
You, as the little abandoned drone called: The Seeker, are waken up many years after the Great Galactic War in a simple quest of finding your owner. This 3D Adventure/Horror game is inspired by Affordable Space Adventures, which was all about exploring in an unknown areas rather than just finishing the mare goal. Just like ASA, you have to avoid enemies, turrets, alarms and other things seeking to destroy you in this SCI-Fi environment.

New weapon:
